text: @realDonaldTrump Something new and relevant PLEASE! @realDonaldTrump #WhiteHouse #DumpTrump2020 What about 130K dead and nothing being done. How about dumping your pathetic stand and order people to wear a mask to slow the spread of Covid19?  How about telling the truth about just one thing????
